text: Ara tadera madhya kichu sankhaka apanara prati kana pete sune, kintu amara tadera antarera upara abarana kare diyechi yena tara ta upalabdhi karate na pare; ara amara tadera kane badhirata tairi karechi [1]. Ara yadi samasta ayata'o tara pratyaksa kare tabu'o tara tate imana anabe na. Emanaki tara yakhana apanara kache upasthita haya, takhana tara apanara sathe bitarke lipta haya, yara kuphari kareche tara bale, â€˜etato agekara dinera upakatha chara ara kichu naya.â€™
